title: RIP Kobe Bryant, MSNBC, Alicia Keys, LBJ and more.
itunes:title: RIP Kobe Bryant, MSNBC, Alicia Keys, LBJ and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today we celebrate the life of Kobe Bryant. Alicia Keys paid tribute to 'The Black Mamba' at the 2020 Grammy Awards. NBA teams also had moments of silence. D Wade, Lebron James and Doc Rivers all spoke about Kobe's influence as a player and friend. We keep the Bryant family in our thoughts and prayers. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about how short life is and the importance of just making a phone call, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
